SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientCommunicationInterface, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientRmi, ClientTcp
public abstract class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable, ClientCommunicationInterface
This class represents the client. It is abstract (non instantiable) because each client will either be an RMI client or a Socket client.
See Also:

    • waitForReconnection

      public void waitForReconnection()
      Waits 60 seconds for other players to reconnect. If nobody reconnects, player wins the game and exits.

    • waitForReconnectionAfterServerDown

      public void waitForReconnectionAfterServerDown()
      Waits 120 seconds for reconnection after the server is down.

    • checkServerConnection

      public void checkServerConnection()
      Checks if the server is still connected. If it's not, exits the game.

    • myTurn

      public void myTurn()
      Asks the player to pick some tiles and sends the message to the server.

    • insert

      public void insert()
      Asks the player to insert the tiles they picked and sends the message to the server.

    • rearrange

      public void rearrange(Message message)
      Asks the player to rearrange the tiles they picked and sends the message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing the tiles to rearrange.

    • setLanguage

      public void setLanguage(String language, String country)
      Sets the game language to the specified one.
      Parameters:
      language - the language selected (2 letters).
      country - the country selected (2 letters).
